Description:
The Specimen resource returns information about specimens used in diagnostic testing.

This resource returns data only for specimen information stored in patient records. It cannot be used to return specimen information stored in requisition grouper records.

bodySite.Name: bodySite
bodySite.Description: The codes describing the anatomical collection site from which the specimen was collected (for example, a lung). For organizations in the Netherlands, this element can also include laterality.

bodySite.laterality.Name: extension
bodySite.laterality.Description: The laterality related to the anatomical collection site in the bodySite element (for example, indicating which lung a specimen was collected from). Available only for organizations in the Netherlands.

collectedDateTime.Name: collectedDateTime
collectedDateTime.Description: Instant derived from the date and time of collection. When there is no date, this item returns null.

collector.Name: collector
collector.Description: Who collected the specimen. Reference to a Practitioner resource.

method.Name: method
method.Description: The method used to collect the specimen (for example, venipuncture).

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Specimen

receivedTime.Name: receivedTime
receivedTime.Description: The time when the specimen was received for processing.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Where the specimen information came from. Reference to the Patient resource.

type.Name: type
type.Description: Kind of material that forms the specimen.
